Nippani is connected with many cities such as
Near Nipani there are many places to visit. A few of them are Mallikarjun temple adi, Samadhi math, Stavnidhi
temple, Ramling, Laxmi temple Bolewadi, Ashok nagar, Junaa Vaada, Janatha lake. Again at outskirts of Nipani

there are many places to visit. A day out in Nipani is really useful.
Nipani is famous for its tobacco growing lands. The tobacco grown in and around Nippani is a must for making biris.
There are plenty of options to eat the food. Very famous side dish is 'bhaji'.
